amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds for the implementation of the Well Control Rule.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 45 printed in House Report 114-683 to ensure that no money is permitted for the implementation of the Well Control Rule.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boustany amendment (A037) Agreed to by recorded vote: 234 - 195 (Roll no. 444).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boustany amendment (A037) Agreed to by recorded vote: 234 - 195 (Roll no. 444).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A037) offered by Mr. Boustany.
